question: A particle moves with uniform acceleration along a straight line. Which of the following graphs represents its motion correctly?
correct_answer: Velocity vs. time is a straight line with a constant slope
incorrect_answers: Displacement vs. time is a straight line
Acceleration vs. time is a curve
Velocity vs. time is a horizontal line
